data.text: “Nanfera Ala Sɛnbɛ Kanna mi kiti waxatine saxi?
Muxu ɲaxine xɛ bɔxɔne danne fari sama,
e kiridin nan ma sofali suxuma,
e tɔrɔ muxune radinma ayi kiraan xɔn,
“Yiigelitɔne sigama e wanla ra nɛn,
E sa e xuruseene balon fen
E ragenle nan xima kɔɛɛn na,
Tulen naxan fama geyane fari,
“Muxu ɲaxine yiigelitɔna diin tongoma a yii doli saranna ra,
Yiigelitɔne ragenla nan sigama,
e oliwi turen bama muxu gbɛtɛne sansanne kui,
Muxune faxamatɔɔn wugama taani,
“Kɛnɛnyaan naɲaxu muxu ɲaxine ma,
Faxa tiin kelima sogen godo waxatin nin,
Yalunden ɲinbanna nan mamɛma,
Muɲaden banxin dɛɛn kalama kɔɛɛn nan na,
Na muxune yanyin fɔlɔma sogen godo waxatin nin,
“Koni ɛ tan a falama, ɛ naxa,
Balabalan kɛsɛne xuyama ayi kii naxan yi sogen na,
Hali naxanye e barixi,
“ ‘Na muxune ɲaxalan gbantane tɔrɔxi nɛn,
Koni Ala nɔɛ sɛnbɛmane raxɔrɛ a sɛnbɛni nɛn,
Ala ne luma bɔɲɛ xunbenla nun marakantanni,
Na muxune sabatima nɛn waxati di,
“Xa a mi na kiini,
